subject: Tracking number for order Order #SSN1761
description_text:
Hi, can I get some tracking information for the order Order #SSN1761

Thank you.

conversations.body_text: Hi Ivan Kolic,  We will look into it as soon as possible and get back to you once tracking information is available. As today is Sunday, processing may be a bit slower than usual—thank you for your understanding.

I got some tracking info with the number: ALS01091583985
But there weren't any updated since 19th.
________________________________
Hi Ivan Kolic,     Sorry for the delays with the logistics provider, here's the link to your logistics tracking, it's been updated.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SYAL000770167
